trans-unit.source: A helpful exercise at this point is to move the boxes around the clip space by varying the code to get a feel for how points get clipped and moved around in clip space. Try drawing a picture like a boxy smiley face with a background.

trans-unit.source: A historical alias to Event.stopPropagation(). Setting its value to true before returning from an event handler prevents propagation of the event.

trans-unit.source: A historical property introduced by Internet Explorer and eventually adopted into the DOM specification in order to ensure existing sites continue to work. Ideally, you should try to use Event.preventDefault() and Event.defaultPrevented instead, but you can use returnValue if you choose to do so.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer引入的历史属性，最终被DOM规范采用，以确保现有站点继续工作。理想情况下，您应该尝试改用 Event.preventDefault() 和 Event.defaultPrevented ，但是如果选择这样做，则可以使用 returnValue 。

trans-unit.source: A legacy Boolean option which used to control whether or not to offer to the remote peer the opportunity to try to send audio. If this value is false, the remote peer will not be offered to send audio data, even if the local side will be sending audio data. If this value is true, the remote peer will be offered to send audio data, even if the local side will not be sending audio data. The default behavior is to offer to receive audio only if the local side is sending audio, not otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 旧版布尔选项，用于控制是否向远程对等方提供尝试发送音频的机会。如果此值为 false ，即使本地端将发送音频数据，也不会提供远程对等方发送音频数据。如果此值为 true ，则将向远程对等方发送音频数据，即使本地端不会发送音频数据也是如此。默认行为是仅在本地发送音频时才提供接收音频，否则不提供。

trans-unit.source: A legacy Boolean option which used to control whether or not to offer to the remote peer the opportunity to try to send video. If this value is false, the remote peer will not be offered to send video data, even if the local side will be sending video data. If this value is true, the remote peer will be offered to send video data, even if the local side will not be sending video data. The default behavior is to offer to receive video only if the local side is sending video, not otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 传统的布尔选项，用于控制是否向远程对等方提供尝试发送视频的机会。如果该值为 false ，即使本地端将发送视频数据，也不会提供远程对等方发送视频数据。如果此值为 true ，则将向远程对等方发送视频数据，即使本地端不会发送视频数据也是如此。默认行为是仅在本地端正在发送视频时才提供接收视频，否则不提供。

trans-unit.source: A local file is dragged using the application/x-moz-file type with a data value that is an nsIFile object. Non-privileged web pages are not able to retrieve or modify data of this type. Because a file is not a string, you must use the mozSetDataAt() method to assign the data. Similarly, when retrieving the data, you must use the mozGetDataAt() method.

trans-unit.source: A long integer value indicating the current value of the channelCount property, specifying the number of audio channels present on the track (therefore indicating how many audio samples exist in each audio frame). This is 1 for mono, 2 for stereo, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数值，指示 channelCount 属性的当前值，该属性指定轨道上存在的音频通道数（因此，指示每个音频帧中存在多少个音频样本）。单声道为1，立体声为2，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: A long integer value indicating the current value of the height property, specifying the height of the track's video data in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数值，指示 height 属性的当前值，以像素为单位指定轨道的视频数据的高度。

trans-unit.source: A long integer value indicating the current value of the sampleRate property, specifying the sample rate in samples per second of the audio data. Standard CD-quality audio, for example, has a sample rate of 41,000 samples per second.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数值，指示 sampleRate 属性的当前值，以音频数据的每秒采样数指定采样率。例如，标准CD质量的音频的采样率为每秒41,000个采样。

trans-unit.source: A long integer value indicating the current value of the sampleSize property, specifying the linear size, in bits, of each audio sample. CD-quality audio, for example, is 16-bit, so this value would be 16 in that case.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数值，指示 sampleSize 属性的当前值，以比特为单位指定每个音频样本的线性大小。例如，CD品质的音频为16位，因此在这种情况下该值为16。

trans-unit.source: A long integer which indicates the total number of frames successfully encoded for this RTP stream. This field is only present on video connections.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数,表示该RTP流成功编码的总帧数。该字段仅在视频连接上存在。

trans-unit.source: A long integer.
trans-unit.target: 一个长整数。

trans-unit.source: A long representing the handle of the requestAnimationFrame() call. This can then be passed to a VRDisplay.cancelAnimationFrame() call to unregister the callback.
trans-unit.target: 一个长 requestAnimationFrame() 表示requestAnimationFrame（）调用的句柄。然后可以将其传递给 VRDisplay.cancelAnimationFrame() 调用以注销回调。

trans-unit.source: A long value representing the amount of twist applied to the pointer.

trans-unit.source: A long, unsigned integer value indicating the priority of the candidate according to the remote peer. The larger this value is, the more preferable the remote peer considers this candidate to be.

trans-unit.source: A mechanism for iterating over multiple records with a key range. The cursor has a source that indicates which index or object store it is iterating. It has a position within the range, and moves in a direction that is increasing or decreasing in the order of record keys. For the reference documentation on cursors, see IDBCursor.
trans-unit.target: 一种遍历具有关键字范围的多个记录的机制。游标具有一个源，该源指示它正在迭代哪个索引或对象存储。它的位置在范围内，并按照记录键的顺序在增加或减少的方向上移动。有关游标的参考文档，请参阅 IDBCursor 。

trans-unit.source: A mechanism for producing new keys in an ordered sequence. If an object store does not have a key generator, then the application must provide keys for records being stored. Generators are not shared between stores. This is more a browser implementation detail, because in web development, you don't really create or access key generators.
trans-unit.target: 一种按顺序产生新钥匙的机制。如果一个对象存储没有键生成器,那么应用程序必须为存储的记录提供键。生成器不在存储之间共享。这更多的是一个浏览器实现的细节,因为在Web开发中,你不会真正创建或访问密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: A media configuration — a VideoConfiguration or AudioConfiguration dictionary.

trans-unit.target: 媒体配置 VideoConfiguration AudioConfiguration 字典。

trans-unit.source: A media element whose source is a MediaStream and whose autoplay property is true will begin playback when it becomes active (that is, when MediaStream.active becomes true).

trans-unit.source: A message channel is created using the MessageChannel() constructor. Once created, the two ports of the channel can be accessed through the MessageChannel.port1 and MessageChannel.port2 properties (which both return MessagePort objects.) The app that created the channel uses port1, and the app at the other end of the port uses port2 — you send a message to port2, and transfer the port over to the other browsing context using window.postMessage along with two arguments (the message to send, and the object to transfer ownership of, in this case the port itself.)
trans-unit.target: 使用 MessageChannel() 构造函数创建一个消息通道。创建通道后，可以通过 MessageChannel.port1 和 MessageChannel.port2 属性（均返回 MessagePort 对象）访问通道的两个端口。创建通道的应用程序使用 port1 ，而端口另一端的应用程序使用 port2 -您将消息发送到 port2 ，并使用 window.postMessage 以及两个参数（要发送的消息和要转让所有权的对象，在这种情况下，端口本身）将端口转移到其他浏览上下文。

trans-unit.target: 包含参数 chunk 方法-这指示每个块要使用的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A minor note is that in IE6-7, this polyfill uses the window[" uCL"] property on the window object for communicating with the CSS expressions, the x-uCLp css property on all elements, and the element[" uCL"] property on all elements to allow garbadge collection and boost performance. In all polyfilled browsers (IE6-9), an additional element[" uCLp"] property is added to element to ensure standards compliant prototyping, and a DOMTokenList[" uCL"] property is added to each element["classList"] object to ensure that the DOMTokenList is bounded to its own element.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的一点是，在IE6-7中，此polyfill使用window对象上的 window[" uCL"] 属性与CSS表达式，所有元素上的 x-uCLp css属性以及 element[" uCL"] 所有元素上的属性，以允许垃圾收集并提高性能。在所有polyfilled浏览器（IE6-9）中，向元素添加了一个额外的 element[" uCLp"] 属性，以确保符合标准的原型，并且向每个 element["classList"] 对象添加了 DOMTokenList[" uCL"] 属性。确保DOMTokenList绑定到其自己的元素。

trans-unit.source: A ping or pong is just a regular frame, but it's a control frame. Pings have an opcode of 0x9, and pongs have an opcode of 0xA. When you get a ping, send back a pong with the exact same Payload Data as the ping (for pings and pongs, the max payload length is 125). You might also get a pong without ever sending a ping; ignore this if it happens.
trans-unit.target: ping或pong只是一个普通的帧，但它是一个控制帧。 Ping的操作码为 0x9 ，而Pong的操作码为 0xA 。收到ping命令后，请使用与ping完全相同的有效载荷数据发送回pong（对于ping和pongs，最大有效载荷长度为125）。您可能还没有发送过ping命令就得到了pong；如果发生这种情况，请忽略它。

trans-unit.source: A pointer is considered primary if the pointer represents a mouse device. A pointer representing pen input is considered the primary pen input if its pointerdown event was dispatched when no other active pointers representing pen input existed. A pointer representing touch input is considered the primary touch input if its pointerdown event was dispatched when no other active pointers representing touch input existed.
trans-unit.target: 如果指针代表鼠标设备，则该指针被视为主要指针。如果在不存在其他表示笔输入的活动指针的情况下调度了其 pointerdown 事件，则表示笔输入的指针将被视为主要笔输入。如果在不存在其他表示触摸输入的活动指针的情况下调度了其下 pointerdown 事件，则表示触摸输入的指针将被视为主要触摸输入。

trans-unit.source: A potential alternative to the main track, such as a different video take or a version of the soundtrack with only the music and no dialogue.
trans-unit.target: 主音轨的潜在替代方案,如不同的录像带或只有音乐而没有对话的配乐版本。

trans-unit.source: A powerful feature of the Web Audio API is that it does not have a strict "sound call limitation". For example, there is no ceiling of 32 or 64 sound calls at one time. Some processors may be capable of playing more than 1,000 simultaneous sounds without stuttering.
trans-unit.target: 网络音频API的一个强大功能是它没有严格的 "声音调用限制"。例如,没有一次32或64次声音调用的上限。一些处理器可能能够同时播放超过1000个声音而不会出现结巴。

trans-unit.source: A powerful, flexible storage mechanism for multiple Firefox OS applications to use to store and share data between one another quickly, efficiently, and securely.
trans-unit.target: 一个强大、灵活的存储机制,可供多个Firefox OS应用程序快速、高效、安全地相互存储和共享数据。

trans-unit.source: A precision type value. Either gl.LOW_FLOAT, gl.MEDIUM_FLOAT, gl.HIGH_FLOAT, gl.LOW_INT, gl.MEDIUM_INT, or gl.HIGH_INT.
trans-unit.target: 精度类型值。无论是 gl.LOW_FLOAT ， gl.MEDIUM_FLOAT ， gl.HIGH_FLOAT ， gl.LOW_INT ， gl.MEDIUM_INT ，或 gl.HIGH_INT 。

trans-unit.target: 一个承诺,一旦开始展示就会解决.围绕承诺的实现或拒绝,有一些规则。

trans-unit.source: A promise that resolves once the presentation has ended.If the VRDisplay is not presenting when exitPresent() is called, the promise will reject.
trans-unit.target: 一诺解析一旦呈现具有ended.If的 VRDisplay 没有呈现时 exitPresent() 被调用时，承诺会拒绝。

trans-unit.source: A random ad is selected by computing Math.floor(Math.random() * ads.length); the result is a value between 0 and one less than the number of ads. The corresponding ad is now known as adBox.
trans-unit.target: 通过计算 Math.floor(Math.random() * ads.length) 选择一个随机广告；结果是比广告数量少0到1之间的值。相应的广告现在称为 adBox 。

trans-unit.source: A range can be created using the createRange() method of the Document object. Range objects can also be retrieved by using the getRangeAt() method of the Selection object or the caretRangeFromPoint() method of the Document object.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 Document 对象的 createRange() 方法创建范围。范围对象也可以通过使用所检索的 getRangeAt() 的方法 Selection 对象或 caretRangeFromPoint() 的方法 Document 对象。

trans-unit.source: A range is a contiguous part of a document. A range can contain entire nodes as well as portions of nodes, such as a portion of a text node. A user will normally only select a single range at a time, but it's possible for a user to select multiple ranges (e.g. by using the Control key). A range can be retrieved from a selection as a range object. Range objects can also be created via the DOM and programmatically added or removed from a selection.
trans-unit.target: 范围是文档的连续部分。范围可以包含整个节点以及部分节点，例如文本节点的一部分。用户通常一次只能选择一个范围，但是用户可以选择多个范围（例如，使用Control键）。可以从选择中检索 range 作为范围对象。范围对象也可以通过DOM创建，并以编程方式添加到选择中或从选择中删除。

trans-unit.source: A range object that will be removed to the selection.
trans-unit.target: 一个将被删除的范围对象。

trans-unit.source: A reader’s lock cannot be released while it still has a pending read request, i.e., if a promise returned by the reader’s ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() method has not finished. This will result in a TypeError being thrown.
trans-unit.target: 当读取器的锁仍具有未决的读取请求时，即，如果读取器的 ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() 方法返回的承诺尚未完成，则无法释放读取器的锁。这将导致 TypeError 。

trans-unit.source: A reader’s lock cannot be released while it still has a pending read request, i.e., if a promise returned by the reader’s ReadableStreamDefaultReader.read() method has not finished. This will result in a TypeError being thrown.

trans-unit.source: A really easy way to start using a matrix is to use the CSS3 matrix3dtransform. First we'll set up a simple <div> with some content. The style is not shown. But it is set to a fixed width and height and centered on the page. The <div> has a transition set for the transform so that matrix is animated in making it easy to see what is being done.
trans-unit.target: 开始使用矩阵的一种非常简单的方法是使用CSS3 matrix3d 转换。首先，我们将设置一些简单的 <div> 内容。样式未显示。但是将其设置为固定的宽度和高度，并以页面为中心。该 <div> 有变换，使矩阵中使其容易看到正在做什么的动画过渡集。

trans-unit.source: A request made via XMLHttpRequest can fetch the data in one of two ways, asynchronously or synchronously. The type of request is dictated by the optional async argument (the third argument) that is set on the XMLHttpRequest.open() method. If this argument is true or not specified, the XMLHttpRequest is processed asynchronously, otherwise the process is handled synchronously. A detailed discussion and demonstrations of these two types of requests can be found on the synchronous and asynchronous requests page. Do not use synchronous requests outside Web Workers.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XMLHttpRequest 发出的请求可以异步或同步两种方式之一获取数据。请求的类型由 XMLHttpRequest.open() 方法上设置的可选 async 参数（第三个参数）决定。如果此参数为 true 或未指定，则将异步处理 XMLHttpRequest ，否则将同步处理该过程。可以在同步和异步请求页面上找到这两种类型的请求的详细讨论和演示。不要在Web Workers外部使用同步请求。

trans-unit.source: A sample is a single float32 value that represents the value of the audio stream at each specific point in time, in a specific channel (left or right, if in the case of stereo). A frame, or sample frame, is the set of all values for all channels that will play at a specific point in time: all the samples of all the channels that play at the same time (two for a stereo sound, six for 5.1, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 一个样本是一个单一的float32值,它代表音频流在每个特定时间点、特定通道(如果是立体声,则为左或右)的值。一帧,或称采样帧,是所有通道在特定时间点播放的所有值的集合:所有通道同时播放的所有采样(对于立体声来说是两个,对于5.1来说是六个,等等)。

trans-unit.source: A scale matrix makes something larger or smaller in one of 3 dimension: width, height, and depth. In typical (cartesian) coordinates this would be stretching and shrinking in x, y, and z.
trans-unit.target: 缩放矩阵使某物在3个维度中的一个维度上变大或变小:宽度、高度和深度。在典型的(笛卡尔)坐标中,这将是在x、y和z上的拉伸和收缩。

trans-unit.source: A server reflexive candidate is generated by a STUN/TURN server; the connection's initiator requests a candidate from the STUN server, which forwards the request through the remote peer's NAT, which creates and returns a candidate whose IP address is local to the remote peer. The STUN server then replies to the initiator's request with a candidate whose IP address is unrelated to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 服务器反射候选者由STUN/TURN服务器生成;连接的发起者向STUN服务器请求候选者,STUN服务器通过远程对等体的NAT转发该请求,创建并返回一个IP地址与远程对等体无关的候选者。然后STUN服务器用一个IP地址与远程对等体无关的候选者来回复发起者的请求。

trans-unit.source: A service worker is an event-driven worker registered against an origin and a path. It takes the form of a JavaScript file that can control the web page/site it is associated with, intercepting and modifying navigation and resource requests, and caching resources in a very granular fashion to give you complete control over how your app behaves in certain situations, (the most obvious one being when the network is not available.)
trans-unit.target: 服务工作人员是根据原点和路径注册的事件驱动的工作人员。它采用JavaScript文件的形式，该文件可以控制与其关联的网页/站点，以非常精细的方式拦截和修改导航和资源请求，以及缓存资源，从而使您可以完全控制应用在特定情况下的行为，（最明显的情况是网络不可用时。）

trans-unit.source: A service worker is first registered using the ServiceWorkerContainer.register() method. If successful, your service worker will be downloaded to the client and attempt installation/activation (see below) for URLs accessed by the user inside the whole origin, or inside a subset specified by you.
trans-unit.target: 首先使用 ServiceWorkerContainer.register() 方法注册服务工作者。如果成功，则将您的服务工作者下载到客户端，并尝试安装/激活（请参见下文）用户在整个来源内或在您指定的子集内访问的URL。

trans-unit.source: A service worker is run in a worker context: it therefore has no DOM access, and runs on a different thread to the main JavaScript that powers your app, so it is not blocking. It is designed to be fully async; as a consequence, APIs such as synchronous XHR and localStorage can't be used inside a service worker.
trans-unit.target: 服务工作程序是在工作程序上下文中运行的：因此它没有DOM访问权限，并且在与为您的应用程序提供功能的主JavaScript不同的线程上运行，因此它不会阻塞。它设计为完全异步；结果，同步XHR和localStorage之类的 API 不能在服务工作者内部使用。

trans-unit.source: A shared worker is accessible by multiple scripts — even if they are being accessed by different windows, iframes or even workers. In this section we'll discuss the JavaScript found in our Basic shared worker example (run shared worker): This is very similar to the basic dedicated worker example, except that it has two functions available handled by different script files: multiplying two numbers, or squaring a number. Both scripts use the same worker to do the actual calculation required.
trans-unit.target: 一个共享的工作程序可以通过多个脚本访问-即使它们被不同的窗口，iframe甚至工作程序访问。在本节中，我们将讨论在基本共享工作程序示例（运行共享工作程序）中找到的JavaScript ：与基本专用工作程序示例非常相似，不同之处在于它具有两个可通过不同脚本文件处理的功能：两个数字相乘，或平方一个数字。这两个脚本使用相同的工作程序进行所需的实际计算。

trans-unit.source: A single constraint is an object whose name matches the constrainable property whose desired value or range of values is being specified. This object contains zero or more individual constraints, as well as an optional sub-object named advanced, which contains another set of zero or more constraints which the user agent must satisfy if at all possible. The user agent attempts to satisfy constraints in the order specified in the constraint set.
trans-unit.target: 单个约束是名称与可约束属性匹配的对象，该可约束属性的期望值或值的范围已指定。该对象包含零个或多个约束，以及一个可选的名为 advanced 子对象，该子对象包含另一组零个或多个约束，用户代理必须尽可能满足这些约束。用户代理尝试按照约束集中指定的顺序满足约束。

trans-unit.source: A single service worker can control many pages. Each time a page within your scope is loaded, the service worker is installed against that page and operates on it. Bear in mind therefore that you need to be careful with global variables in the service worker script: each page doesn’t get its own unique worker.
trans-unit.target: 一个服务人员可以控制多个页面。每次加载您范围内的页面时，都会针对该页面安装Service Worker并对其进行操作。因此请记住，您需要小心服务工作程序脚本中的全局变量：每个页面都没有自己的唯一工作程序。

trans-unit.source: A string describing the standard or specification as well as the currency system identifier within that system which was used to provide the value. This has been removed; instead of allowing sites to choose the standard to use, ISO 4217 is always used for the currency identifier now.

trans-unit.source: A string from the RequestDestination enumerated type which indicates the type of content the request is asking for. This type is much broader than the usual document type values (such as "document" or "manifest"), and may include contextual cues such as "image" or "worker" or "audioworklet".
trans-unit.target: 来自 RequestDestination 枚举类型的字符串，指示请求所请求的内容的类型。此类型比通常的文档类型值（例如 "document" 或 "manifest" ）宽得多，并且可能包括上下文提示，例如 "image" 或 "worker" 或 "audioworklet" 。

trans-unit.source: A string from the RTCIceGathererState enumerated type whose value indicates the current state of the ICE agent's candidate gathering process:
trans-unit.target: 来自 RTCIceGathererState 枚举类型的字符串，其值指示ICE代理的候选收集过程的当前状态：

trans-unit.source: A string from the RTCPriorityType enumerated type which indicates the encoding's priority. Default value is "low".
trans-unit.target: 来自 RTCPriorityType 枚举类型的字符串，指示编码的优先级。默认值为 "low" 。

trans-unit.source: A string from the enum RTCRtpTransceiverDirection which indicates the transceiver's current directionality, or null if the transceiver is stopped or has never participated in an exchange of offers and answers.
trans-unit.target: 来自 RTCRtpTransceiverDirection 枚举的字符串，指示收发器的当前方向性；如果收发器已停止或从未参与过要约和答复的交换，则为 null 。

trans-unit.source: A string from the enum RTCRtpTransceiverDirection which is used to set the transceiver's desired direction.
trans-unit.target: 枚举 RTCRtpTransceiverDirection 中的字符串，用于设置收发器的所需方向。

trans-unit.source: A string identifier assigned by the Web site or app when the data channel was created, as specified when RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() was called to create the channel.
trans-unit.target: 创建数据通道时由网站或应用程序分配的字符串标识符，如在 RTCPeerConnection.createDataChannel() 创建通道时所指定的。

trans-unit.source: A string identifying the type of event described. The onmessage handler is called if no event name is specified for a message.

trans-unit.source: A string which specifies a set of offsets to add to the root's bounding_box when calculating intersections, effectively shrinking or growing the root for calculation purposes. trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，指定要播放的波形的形状；它可以是许多标准值之一，也可以是 custom 以使用 PeriodicWave 来描述自定义波形。不同的波浪会产生不同的音调。标准值为 "sine" ， "square" ， "sawtooth" ， "triangle" 和 "custom" 。默认值为 "sine" 。

trans-unit.source: A term commonly used in VR because it is a major handicap of using an HMD — we are constantly fooling the eye with what we are showing in the app canvas, and this leads to the eyes doing a lot more work than they normally would, so using VR apps for any extended period of time can lead to eye strain.

trans-unit.source: A translation matrix is based off the identity matrix. It moves the object in one of 3 directions, x, y, or z. The easiest way to think of a translation is like picking up a coffee cup. The coffee cup must be kept upright and oriented the same way so that no coffee is spilled. It can move up in the air off the table and around the air in space.
trans-unit.target: 平移矩阵是基于身份矩阵的,它使物体在x、y或z三个方向上移动。最简单的方法是将物体在X、Y或Z三个方向上移动。咖啡杯必须保持直立,并且方向不变,这样才不会洒出咖啡。它可以在离开桌子的空中移动,也可以在空间的空中移动。

trans-unit.source: A typical registration process has six steps, as illustrated in Figure 1 and described further below. This is a simplification of the data required for the registration process that is only intended to provide an overview. The full set of required fields, optional fields, and their meanings for creating a registration request can be found in the PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions dictionary. Likewise, the full set of response fields can be found in the PublicKeyCredential interface (where PublicKeyCredential.response is the AuthenticatorAttestationResponse interface). Note most JavaScript programmers that are creating an application will only really care about steps 1 and 5 where the create() function is called and subsequently returns; however, steps 2, 3, and 4 are essential to understanding the processing that takes place in the browser and authenticator and what the resulting data means.
trans-unit.target: 典型的注册过程包括六个步骤，如图1所示，并在下面进一步描述。这是注册过程所需数据的简化，仅用于提供概述。完整的必填字段，可选字段及其创建注册请求的含义可以在 PublicKeyCredentialCreationOptions 词典中找到。同样，可以在 PublicKeyCredential 接口中找到完整的响应字段集（其中 PublicKeyCredential.response 是 AuthenticatorAttestationResponse 接口）。注意，大多数正在创建应用程序的JavaScript程序员只会真正关心第1步和第5步，其中create（）函数被调用并随后返回。但是，步骤2、3和4对于理解浏览器和身份验证器中进行的处理以及所得到的数据意味着什么至关重要。

trans-unit.source: A typical use case, is to resume the iteration where a previous cursor has been closed, without having to compare the keys one by one.

trans-unit.source: A usable pairing of local and remote candidates has been found for all components of the connection, and the connection has been established. It's possible that gathering is still underway, and it's also possible that the ICE agent is still checking candidates against one another looking for a better connection to use.
trans-unit.target: 已经为连接的所有组件找到了本地和远程候选者的可用配对,连接已经建立。有可能收集工作还在进行中,也有可能ICE代理还在互相检查候选者,寻找更好的连接来使用。

trans-unit.source: A user can normally only select one range at a time, so the rangeCount will usually be 1. Scripting can be used to make the selection contain more than 1 range.
trans-unit.target: 用户通常一次只能选择一个范围，因此 rangeCount 通常为 1 。脚本可用于使所选内容包含多个范围。

trans-unit.source: A user may make a selection from left to right (in document order) or right to left (reverse of document order). The anchor is where the user began the selection and the focus is where the user ends the selection. If you make a selection with a desktop mouse, the anchor is placed where you pressed the mouse button and the focus is placed where you released the mouse button. Anchor and focus should not be confused with the start and end positions of a selection, since anchor can be placed before the focus or vice versa, depending on the direction you made your selection.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以从左至右（按文档顺序）或从右至左（与文档顺序相反）进行选择。该锚是用户开始选择和焦点是用户端的选择。如果使用桌面鼠标进行选择，则将锚点放置在按下鼠标按钮的位置，将焦点放置在释放鼠标按钮的位置。不要将锚点和焦点与选区的开始和结束位置混淆，因为根据您选择的方向，可以将锚点放在焦点之前，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: A user may make a selection from left to right (in document order) or right to left (reverse of document order). The anchor is where the user began the selection. This can be visualized by holding the Shift key and pressing the arrow keys on your keyboard. The selection's anchor does not move, but the selection's focus, the other end of the selection, does move.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以从左到右(按文档顺序)或从右到左(与文档顺序相反)进行选择。锚点是用户开始选择的地方。这可以通过按住Shift键和按键盘上的方向键来可视化。选区的锚点不会移动,但选区的焦点,即选区的另一端会移动。

trans-unit.source: A user may make a selection from left to right (in document order) or right to left (reverse of document order). The focus is where the user ended the selection. This can be visualized by holding the Shift key and pressing the arrow keys on your keyboard to modify the current selection. The selection's focus moves, but the selection's anchor, the other end of the selection, does not move.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以从左到右(按文档顺序)或从右到左(与文档顺序相反)进行选择。焦点是用户结束选择的地方。这可以通过按住Shift键和按键盘上的方向键来修改当前选区来可视化。选区的焦点会移动,但选区的锚点,即选区的另一端不会移动。

trans-unit.source: A user selects the (imaginary) text "ve two ea" from "Rabbits have two ears." on a web page. The user then clicks a button that executes the JavaScript snippet window.getSelection().deleteFromDocument(). The document's text becomes "Rabbits hars."
trans-unit.target: 用户从“兔子有两只耳朵的耳朵”中选择（虚构）文本“ ve two ea”。在网页上。然后，用户单击执行JavaScript代码段 window.getSelection().deleteFromDocument() 的按钮。该文档的文本变为“ Rabbits hars”。

trans-unit.source: A user-readable title string for the protocol handler. This will be displayed to the user in interface objects as needed.
trans-unit.target: 协议处理程序的一个用户可读的标题字符串。这将根据需要在界面对象中显示给用户。

trans-unit.source: A value of 1.0 indicates it should play at the same speed as its sampling rate, values less than 1.0 cause the sound to play more slowly, while values greater than 1.0 result in audio playing faster than normal. The default value is 1.0. When set to another value, the AudioBufferSourceNode resamples the audio before sending it to the output.
trans-unit.target: 值1.0表示应以与其采样率相同的速度播放，值小于1.0会导致声音播放更慢，而值大于1.0会导致音频播放速度比正常速度快。默认值为 1.0 。设置为另一个值时， AudioBufferSourceNode 在将音频发送到输出之前会对其重新采样。

trans-unit.source: A value of auto means the browser is free to apply its default touch behavior (to the specified region) and the value of none disables the browser's default touch behavior for the region. The values pan-x and pan-y, mean that touches that begin on the specified region are only for horizontal and vertical scrolling, respectively. The value manipulation means the browser may consider touches that begin on the element are only for scrolling and zooming.
trans-unit.target: auto 值表示浏览器可以自由地将其默认触摸行为（应用于指定区域）， none 值禁用浏览器对该区域的默认触摸行为。值 pan-x 和 pan-y 表示分别从指定区域开始的触摸仅用于水平和垂直滚动。值 manipulation 意味着浏览器可以考虑从元素开始的触摸仅用于滚动和缩放。

trans-unit.source: A value of false indicates that the audio should continue to be transmitted regardless of whether or not speech is detected.
trans-unit.target: 值为 false 表示无论是否检测到语音，都应继续发送音频。

trans-unit.source: A worker is an object created using a constructor (e.g. Worker()) that runs a named JavaScript file — this file contains the code that will run in the worker thread; workers run in another global context that is different from the current window. Thus, using the window shortcut to get the current global scope (instead of self) within a Worker will return an error.
trans-unit.target: 工作程序是使用运行命名的JavaScript文件的构造函数（例如 Worker() ）创建的对象-该文件包含将在工作程序线程中运行的代码；工作人员在与当前 window 不同的另一个全局环境中运行。因此，使用 window 快捷方式获取 Worker 中的当前全局范围（而不是 self ）将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: A worker is an object created using a constructor (e.g. Worker()) that runs a named JavaScript file — this file contains the code that will run in the worker thread; workers run in another global context that is different from the current window. This context is represented by either a DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope object (in the case of dedicated workers - workers that are utilized by a single script), or a SharedWorkerGlobalScope (in the case of shared workers - workers that are shared between multiple scripts).
trans-unit.target: 工作程序是使用运行命名的JavaScript文件的构造函数（例如 Worker() ）创建的对象-该文件包含将在工作程序线程中运行的代码；工作人员在与当前 window 不同的另一个全局环境中运行。此上下文由 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 对象（对于专用工作人员-由单个脚本使用的工作人员）或 SharedWorkerGlobalScope （对于共享工作人员-在多个脚本之间共享的工作人员）表示。

trans-unit.source: Abort due to bad requests, e.g. trying to add() the same key twice, or put() with the same index key with a uniqueness constraint. This causes an error on the request, which can bubble up to an error on the transaction, which aborts the transaction. Can be prevented by using preventDefault() on the error event on the request.
trans-unit.target: 由于坏的请求而中止,例如试图两次添加()相同的键,或者用相同的索引键与唯一性约束的put()。这将导致请求上的错误,可能会冒出事务上的错误,从而中止事务。可以通过在请求上的错误事件上使用 preventDefault()来防止。

trans-unit.source: Abort these steps.
trans-unit.target: 中止这些步骤。

trans-unit.source: According to the specification, the default value for the passive option is always false. However, this introduces the potential for event listeners handling certain touch events (among others) to block the browser's main thread while it is attempting to handle scrolling, resulting in possibly enormous reduction in performance during scroll handling.
trans-unit.target: 根据规范， passive 选项的默认值始终为false。但是，这会导致事件侦听器可能会处理某些触摸事件（以及其他事件），从而在浏览器尝试处理滚动时阻塞浏览器的主线程，从而可能导致滚动处理期间的性能大幅下降。

trans-unit.source: Activating a service worker to deliver a push message can result in increased resource usage, particularly of the battery. Different browsers have different schemes for handling this, there is currently no standard mechanism. Firefox allows a limited number (quota) of push messages to be sent to an application, although Push messages that generate notifications are exempt from this limit. The limit is refreshed each time the site is visited. In comparison, Chrome applies no limit, but requires that every push message causes a notification to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 激活服务工作者来传递推送消息会导致资源使用量增加,尤其是电池。不同的浏览器有不同的处理方案,目前还没有标准的机制。火狐允许向应用程序发送有限数量(配额)的推送消息,尽管生成通知的推送消息不受此限制。每次访问网站时,该限制都会被刷新。相比之下,Chrome没有限制,但要求每条推送消息都要显示通知。

trans-unit.source: Actually part of CSS Animations.
trans-unit.target: 其实是CSS Animations的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Actually, regarding memory consumption, the lack of keeping a function reference is not the real issue; rather it is the lack of keeping a STATIC function reference. In both problem-cases below, a function reference is kept, but since it is redefined on each iteration, it is not static. In the third case, the reference to the anonymous function is being reassigned with each iteration. In the fourth case, the entire function definition is unchanging, but it is still being repeatedly defined as if new (unless it was [[promoted]] by the complier) and so is not static. Therefore, though appearing to be simply [[Multiple identical event listeners]], in both cases each iteration will instead create a new listener with its own unique reference to the handler function. However, since the function definition itself does not change, the SAME function may still be called for every duplicate listener (especially if the code gets optimized.)
trans-unit.target: 其实,关于内存消耗,没有保留函数引用并不是真正的问题,而是没有保留static函数引用。在下面的两个问题案例中,都保留了一个函数引用,但由于它在每次迭代时都被重新定义,所以不是静态的。在第三种情况下,匿名函数的引用在每次迭代时都被重新分配。在第四种情况下,整个函数定义是不变的,但它仍然被重复定义为新的(除非它被编译器[[promoted]]),所以不是静态的。因此,虽然看起来只是[[多个相同的事件监听器]],但在这两种情况下,每次迭代反而会创建一个新的监听器,并有自己对处理函数的唯一引用。然而,由于函数定义本身并没有改变,所以对于每个重复的监听器,仍然可以调用SAME函数(特别是当代码得到优化时。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, indexes have the ability to enforce simple constraints on the stored data. By setting the unique flag when creating the index, the index ensures that no two objects are stored with both having the same value for the index's key path. So, for example, if you have an object store which holds a set of people, and you want to ensure that no two people have the same email address, you can use an index with the unique flag set to enforce this.
trans-unit.target: 此外,索引还能够对存储的数据实施简单的约束。通过在创建索引时设置唯一标志,索引可以确保没有两个对象在存储时都具有相同的索引键路径值。因此,举例来说,如果你有一个对象存储,其中存储了一组人,而你想确保没有两个人拥有相同的电子邮件地址,你可以使用设置了唯一标志的索引来强制执行。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, of course, the Feature Policy "fullscreen" permission must be granted.
trans-unit.target: 另外，当然，必须授予功能策略 "fullscreen" 权限。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, synchronous requests are not allowed from within a service worker — only asynchronous requests, like those initiated via the fetch() method, can be used.
trans-unit.target: 另外，服务工作者内部不允许同步请求-只能使用异步请求，例如通过 fetch() 方法启动的异步请求。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the points attribute on the original element accessed via the XML DOM (e.g., using the getAttribute() method call) will reflect any changes made to the SVGAnimatedPoints.points attribut.
trans-unit.target: 另外，通过XML DOM访问的原始元素上的 points 属性（例如，使用 getAttribute() 方法调用）将反映对 SVGAnimatedPoints.points 属性所做的任何更改。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the scrollPathIntoView() method can be used to make an element visible on the screen if focused, for example.
trans-unit.target: 另外，例如，如果聚焦， scrollPathIntoView() 方法可用于使元素在屏幕上可见。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the server can decide on extension/subprotocol requests here; see Miscellaneous for details. The Sec-WebSocket-Accept part is interesting. The server must derive it from the Sec-WebSocket-Key that the client sent. To get it, concatenate the client's Sec-WebSocket-Key and "258EAFA5-E914-47DA-95CA-C5AB0DC85B11" together (it's a "magic string"), take the SHA-1 hash of the result, and return the base64 encoding of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 另外，服务器可以在此处决定扩展/子协议请求。有关详细信息，请参见其他。该 Sec-WebSocket-Accept 部分是有趣的。服务器必须从客户端发送的 Sec-WebSocket-Key 派生它。要获得它，请将客户端的 Sec-WebSocket-Key 和“ 258EAFA5-E914-47DA-95CA-C5AB0DC85B11 ”连接在一起（这是一个“ 魔术字符串 ”），获取结果的SHA-1哈希，然后返回的base64编码哈希。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this property should update whenever a browser is no longer capable of connecting to the network. According to the specification:
trans-unit.target: 此外,每当浏览器不再能够连接到网络时,这个属性就应该更新。根据规范。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when resetting :
trans-unit.target: 此外,当重置 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a cubic Bézier curve to the path. It requires three points. The first two points are control points and the third one is the end point. The starting point is the last point in the current path, which can be changed using moveTo() before creating the Bézier curve.

trans-unit.source: Adds a new stop, defined by an offset and a color, to the gradient. If the offset is not between 0 and 1, inclusive, an INDEX_SIZE_ERR is raised; if the color can't be parsed as a CSS <color>, a SYNTAX_ERR is raised.
trans-unit.target: 向渐变添加由 offset 和 color 定义的新色标。如果偏移量不在 0 和 1 之间（包括0和1），则引发 INDEX_SIZE_ERR ；否则，将引发INDEX_SIZE_ERR。如果不能将颜色解析为CSS <color> ，则会引发 SYNTAX_ERR 。

trans-unit.source: Adds a path to the current path.
trans-unit.target: 在当前路径上添加一个路径。

trans-unit.source: Adds a rotation to the transformation matrix. The angle argument represents a clockwise rotation angle and is expressed in radians.
trans-unit.target: 在变换矩阵中添加一个旋转角度。角度参数代表顺时针旋转角度,以弧度表示。

trans-unit.source: Adds a scaling transformation to the canvas units by x horizontally and by y vertically.
trans-unit.target: 为画布单位添加水平方向x和垂直方向y的缩放变换。

trans-unit.source: Adds a single marker to the browser's Performance or Waterfall tool. This lets you correlate a point in your code with the other events recorded in the timeline, such as layout and paint events.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器的“ 性能”或“ 瀑布”工具中添加一个标记。这使您可以将代码中的一个点与时间轴中记录的其他事件（例如布局和绘画事件）相关联。

trans-unit.source: Adds a straight line to the path, going to the start of the current sub-path.
trans-unit.target: 在路径上添加一条直线,指向当前子路径的起点。

trans-unit.source: Adds a text track (such as a track for subtitles) to a media element.
trans-unit.target: 为一个媒体元素添加一个文本轨道(如字幕的轨道)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a translation transformation by moving the canvas and its origin x horzontally and y vertically on the grid.

trans-unit.source: Adds an utterance to the utterance queue; it will be spoken when any other utterances queued before it have been spoken.

trans-unit.source: Adds an HTML block-level element around the line containing the current selection, replacing the block element containing the line if one exists (in Firefox, <blockquote> is the exception — it will wrap any containing block element). Requires a tag-name string as a value argument. Virtually all block-level elements can be used. (Internet Explorer and Edge support only heading tags H1–H6, ADDRESS, and PRE, which must be wrapped in angle brackets, such as "<H1>".)

trans-unit.source: After a user has registered with WebAuthn, they can subsequently authenticate (a.k.a. - login or sign-in) with the service. The authentication flow looks similar to the registration flow, and the illustration of actions in Figure 2 may be recognizable as being similar to the illustration of registration actions in Figure 1. The primary differences between registration and authentication are that: 1) authentication doesn't require user or relying party information; and 2) authentication creates an assertion using the previously generated key pair for the service rather than creating an attestation with the key pair that was burned into the authenticator during manufacturing. Again, the description of authentication below is a broad overview rather than getting into all the options and features of WebAuthn. The specific options for authenticating can be found in the PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions dictionary, and the resulting data can be found in the PublicKeyCredential interface (where PublicKeyCredential.response is the AuthenticatorAssertionResponse interface) .
trans-unit.target: 用户在WebAuthn中注册后，他们随后可以使用该服务进行身份验证（又名-登录或登录）。身份验证流程看起来类似于注册流程，并且可以将图2中的动作说明识别为类似于图1中的注册动作的说明。注册和身份验证之间的主要区别在于：1）身份验证不要求用户或信赖方信息； 2）身份验证使用先前生成的服务密钥对创建一个断言，而不是使用在制造过程中被烧入身份验证器中的密钥对创建证明。同样，下面对身份验证的描述是一个广泛的概述，而不是进入WebAuthn的所有选项和功能。身份验证的特定选项可以在 PublicKeyCredentialRequestOptions 字典，并且可以在 PublicKeyCredential 接口（其中 PublicKeyCredential.response 是 AuthenticatorAssertionResponse 接口）中找到结果数据。
